contents: 看你被踩好心疼，，，不过下一次“先问是不是，再问为什么”；中世纪并不是所谓“黑暗时代”，这个说法在今天不被大家接受了。“As the accomplishments of the era came to be better understood in the 19th and 20th centuries, scholars began restricting the "Dark Ages" appellation to the Early Middle Ages (c. 5th–10th century),[6][7][8] and now scholars also reject its usage in this period.[9] ” retrieved from https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dark_Ages_(historiography)
